mapper.insert: insert into history_tb(amount, w_account_id, d_account_id, w_balance, d_balance, created_at) values (#{amount}, #{wAccountId}, #{dAccountId}, #{wBalance}, #{dBalance}, now());
mapper.update: update history_tb set amount = #{amount}, w_account_id = #{wAccountId}, d_account_id = #{dAccountId}, w_balance = #{wBalance}, d_balance = #{dBalance} where id = #{id}
